item.title: [c21] Bojuka Bog
item.description:
Land

Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield tapped.

When Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield, exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

{T}: Add {B}.

item.title: [c21] Battlefield Forge
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {R} or {W}. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

item.title: [c21] Barren Moor
item.description:
Land

Barren Moor enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {B}.

Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.title: [c21] Mikokoro, Center of the Sea
item.description:
Legendary Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{2}, {T}: Each player draws a card.

item.title: [c21] Caves of Koilos
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {W} or {B}. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.

item.title: [c21] Boros Garrison
item.description:
Land

Boros Garrison enters the battlefield tapped.

When Boros Garrison enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.

{T}: Add {R}{W}.

item.title: [c21] Tainted Field
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {W} or {B}. Activate this ability only if you control a Swamp.

item.title: [c21] Orzhov Basilica
item.description:
Land

Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield tapped.

When Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.

{T}: Add {W}{B}.

item.title: [c21] Temple of Silence
item.description:
Land

Temple of Silence enters the battlefield tapped.

When Temple of Silence enters the battlefield, scry 1.

{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

item.title: [c21] Bloodthirsty Blade
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

{1}: Attach Bloodthirsty Blade to target creature an opponent controls. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

item.title: [c21] Mycosynth Wellspring
item.description:
Artifact

When Mycosynth Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [c21] Coveted Jewel
item.description:
Artifact

When Coveted Jewel enters the battlefield, draw three cards.

{T}: Add three mana of any one color.

Whenever one or more creatures an opponent controls attack you and aren't blocked, that player draws three cards and gains control of Coveted Jewel. Untap it.

item.title: [c21] Orzhov Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Add {W}{B}.

item.title: [c21] Victory Chimes
item.description:
Artifact

Untap Victory Chimes during each other player's untap step.

{T}: A player of your choice adds {C}.

item.title: [c21] Spectral Searchlight
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Choose a player. That player adds one mana of any color they choose.

item.title: [c21] Pendant of Prosperity
item.description:
Artifact

Pendant of Prosperity enters the battlefield under the control of an opponent of your choice.

{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. Pendant of Prosperity's owner draws a card, then that player may put a land card from their hand onto the battlefield.

item.title: [c21] Deathbringer Liege
item.description:
Creature — Horror

Other white creatures you control get +1/+1.

Other black creatures you control get +1/+1.

Whenever you cast a white spell, you may tap target creature.

Whenever you cast a black spell, you may destroy target creature if it's tapped.

item.title: [c21] Teysa, Envoy of Ghosts
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Advisor

Vigilance, protection from creatures

Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, destroy that creature. Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.

item.title: [c21] Magister of Worth
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

Will of the council — When Magister of Worth enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for grace or condemnation. If grace gets more votes, each player returns each creature card from their graveyard to the battlefield. If condemnation gets more votes or the vote is tied, destroy all creatures other than Magister of Worth.

item.title: [c21] Debtors' Knell
item.description:
Enchantment

({W/B} can be paid with either {W} or {B}.)

At the beginning of your upkeep, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

item.title: [c21] Utter End
item.description:
Instant

Exile target nonland permanent.

item.title: [c21] Necropolis Regent
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Flying

Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put that many +1/+1 counters on it.

item.title: [c21] Infernal Offering
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose an opponent. You and that player each sacrifice a creature. Each player who sacrificed a creature this way draws two cards.

Choose an opponent. Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then that player returns a creature card from their graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [c21] Deathbringer Regent
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Deathbringer Regent enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand and there are five or more other creatures on the battlefield, destroy all other creatures.

item.title: [c21] Curse of Disturbance
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura Curse

Enchant player

Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

item.title: [c21] Parasitic Impetus
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

Whenever enchanted creature attacks, its controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

item.title: [c21] Boreas Charger
item.description:
Creature — Pegasus

Flying

When Boreas Charger leaves the battlefield, choose an opponent who controls more lands than you. Search your library for a number of Plains cards equal to the difference and reveal them. Put one of them onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [c21] Angel of Serenity
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

When Angel of Serenity enters the battlefield, you may exile up to three other target creatures from the battlefield and/or creature cards from graveyards.

When Angel of Serenity leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.

item.title: [c21] Duelist's Heritage
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever one or more creatures attack, you may have target attacking creature gain double strike until end of turn.

item.title: [c21] Citadel Siege
item.description:
Enchantment

As Citadel Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.

• Khans — At the beginning of combat on your turn, put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.

• Dragons — At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, tap target creature that player controls.

item.title: [c21] Knight of the White Orchid
item.description:
Creature — Human Knight

First strike

When Knight of the White Orchid enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [c21] Hunted Lammasu
item.description:
Creature — Lammasu

Flying

When Hunted Lammasu enters the battlefield, target opponent creates a 4/4 black Horror creature token.

item.title: [c21] Gideon, Champion of Justice
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Gideon

+1: Put a loyalty counter on Gideon, Champion of Justice for each creature target opponent controls.

0: Until end of turn, Gideon, Champion of Justice becomes a Human Soldier creature with power and toughness each equal to the number of loyalty counters on him and gains indestructible. He's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

−15: Exile all other permanents.

item.title: [c21] Ghostly Prison
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

item.title: [c21] Elite Scaleguard
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

When Elite Scaleguard enters the battlefield, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)

Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

item.title: [c21] Orzhov Advokist
item.description:
Creature — Human Advisor

At the beginning of your upkeep, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. If a player does, creatures that player controls can't attack you or a planeswalker you control until your next turn.

item.title: [c21] Oreskos Explorer
item.description:
Creature — Cat Scout

When Oreskos Explorer enters the battlefield, search your library for up to X Plains cards, where X is the number of players who control more lands than you. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [c21] Oblation
item.description:
Instant

The owner of target nonland permanent shuffles it into their library, then draws two cards.

item.title: [c21] Martial Impetus
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

Whenever enchanted creature attacks, each other creature that's attacking one of your opponents gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [c21] Sunscorch Regent
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Sunscorch Regent and you gain 1 life.

item.title: [c21] Stalking Leonin
item.description:
Creature — Cat Archer

When Stalking Leonin enters the battlefield, secretly choose an opponent.

Reveal the player you chose: Exile target creature that's attacking you if it's controlled by the chosen player. Activate this ability only once.

item.title: [c21] Soul Snare
item.description:
Enchantment

{W}, Sacrifice Soul Snare: Exile target creature that's attacking you or a planeswalker you control.

item.title: [c21] Selfless Squire
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Flash

When Selfless Squire enters the battlefield, prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

Whenever damage that would be dealt to you is prevented, put that many +1/+1 counters on Selfless Squire.

item.title: [c21] Zetalpa, Primal Dawn
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elder Dinosaur

Flying, double strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible

item.title: [c21] Windborn Muse
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

item.title: [c21] Vow of Duty
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has vigilance, and can't attack you or a planeswalker you control.

item.title: [c21] Tragic Arrogance
item.description:
Sorcery

For each player, you choose from among the permanents that player controls an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a planeswalker. Then each player sacrifices all other nonland permanents they control.

item.title: [c21] Together Forever
item.description:
Enchantment

When Together Forever enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.)

{1}: Choose target creature with a counter on it. When that creature dies this turn, return that card to its owner's hand.

item.title: [c21] Witch's Clinic
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{2}, {T}: Target commander gains lifelink until end of turn.

item.title: [c21] Revival Experiment
item.description:
Sorcery

For each permanent type, return up to one card of that type from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose 3 life for each card returned this way. Exile Revival Experiment.
